data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: An oxygen-binding curve is a plot that shows fractional saturation versus the concentration of oxygen. By ____, ____ saturation ____ the ____ of ____ sites ____ have ____. Fractional ____ can ____ from ____ ( ____ sites ____ empty ) to ____ ( ____ sites ____ filled ). The concentration of oxygen is determined by partial pressure.
data.partBlankContent: An oxygen-binding curve is a plot that shows fractional saturation versus the concentration of oxygen. By defin_____, fract_____ saturation indi_____ the pres____ of bin____ sites th__ have oxy___. Fractional satur_____ can ra___ from ze__ ( a__ sites a__ empty ) to o__ ( a__ sites a__ filled ). The concentration of oxygen is determined by partial pressure.
data.answer: 氧结合曲线是一种显示分数饱和度与氧浓度的曲线。根据定义，分数饱和度表明存在含氧的结合位点。分数饱和度的范围可以从零(所有站点是空的)到一(所有站点是填充的)。氧气的浓度是由分压决定的。
